user_query: I'm organizing a music-themed event for my company and I need some background information. Fetch me the latest release from a popular artist on Shazam to create a playlist. Additionally, provide me with the basic information of a song on Soundcloud and an editorial object from Deezer to understand the artist's background.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest release from a popular artist on Shazam.
Provide basic information of a song on Soundcloud.
Retrieve an editorial object from Deezer to understand the artist's background.
